content:
Im currently a student who is going to a university for a computer science degree, so I've had my fair share of different ways programming is taught. I recently had a hard time getting into my degree thanks to the change of pace COVID brought, and I was looking for a tutor originally but instead found this app. I am so glad I found it, this has saved me from paying for an expensive tutor and has improved my understanding of programming. 

There are minor bugs I have found, such as: when you get to certain points in the building of ‚Äòyour game‚Äô sometimes you won‚Äôt be able to take an action (e.g. shoot a missile at the planet); also when you do the challenges, sometimes even if you click the correct answer it will say you clicked the wrong one and you‚Äôll get it wrong either way. 

Overall amazing app and I would recommend this to any student or person who is trying to get into coding. I‚Äôve spent thousands on professors that couldn‚Äôt teach what this app can.
title: Amazing way to teach, but some minor bugs

content: I have really liked this app for refreshing my programming knowledge, but the number of bugs is starting to frustrate me. My progress had been saved for months, but the second I‚Äôm asked to sign in so that I don‚Äôt lose my progress, it gets lost. I‚Äôm very frustrated with having to start over.
title: Good for learning programming, not great practical programming

developerResponse: {'id': 21684828, 'body': 'We are working on the graphics. You will get is fix on next release.\nWe are extremely sorry for the inconvenience.', 'modified': '2021-03-16T12:58:35Z'}
content:
Invested a lot of time in the app and got pretty far into it (as a paying customer). The concepts then became harder (as expected) and the language errors along with non functionality of graphics became a hindering factor in learning. 

Emailed support multiple times to provide feedback on issues and the common response has been ‚Äúwe will fix it soon‚Äù.

 It has been over 3 months and the delay has prevented progress which has also resulted in forgetting previous concepts learned. 

Recommend the team scale back and fix issues on the bottom before expanding scope.
title: Too many Errors and graphics missing

content: This is a great fundamental app to learn programming basics and prepares to get your hands wet in the real world of coding and making virtually whatever you want it‚Äôs great
title: Fantastic tool
